alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Santa Rosa Coastal (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 6:09PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Santa Rosa and south central Escambia Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 509 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Oriole Beach, or 9 miles northeast of Gulf Breeze, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pensacola, Brent, West Pensacola, Gulf Breeze, Goulding, Myrtle Grove and Oriole Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
